Title: Essence, Shards, and Chromatic Dust
Description:
We seem to be in constant need of basic components. Essence, shards... and our stock of Chromatic Dust is almost always depleted.

If you wouldn't mind helping us stock up, perhaps we can make it more than a day into the week without needing to replenish our supply.
ObjectivesText: Craft 10 Chromatic Dust for Soragosa in Valdrakken.
